gw.api.database.spatial

Class SpatialPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.database.spatial.SpatialPolygon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpatialObject

    public class SpatialPolygon
extends Object
implements SpatialObject
    Opaque representation of a spatial polygon. Only the Well-Known Text is exposed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      String StreamName
      the stream name, if the WKT came from a stream
      boolean Valid
      Checks if the geometry is valid. Note that for some database types, this could execute a query against the database.
      String ValidationResult
      On Oracle, returns the validation results. null in all other cases.
      String WellKnownText
      the well known text for this geometry object

      • Fields inherited from class java.lang.Object

        Class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpatialPolygon(String wellKnownText)
      Construct new SpatialPolygon described by given Well-Known Text.
      SpatialPolygon(String streamName, InputStream stream)
      Construct new SpatialPolygon described by Well-Known Text in given stream.
      SpatialPolygon()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SpatialPoint centerOfRectangle(SpatialPoint point1, SpatialPoint point2)
      Utility method to compute the center of a rectangle. The two given points are diagonally opposed points in the rectangle.
      static SpatialPolygon createRectangle(SpatialPoint point1, SpatialPoint point2)
      Utility method to create a polygon that is a rectangle where the two given points are diagonally opposed points.
      boolean equals(Object Object)
      int hashCode()
      String toString()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
